title.rendered: Samsung Galaxy A20e Mobile Phone; Sim Free Smartphone – Blue (UK Version)

content.rendered:
Samsung Galaxy A20e Dual-SIM 32GB 5.8-Inch HD+ 13MP Camera Android 9 Pie UK Version Smartphone – Blue – MAIN CAMERA: Dual 13 MP, f/1.9, 28mm (huge), AF, 5 MP, f/2.2, 12mm (ultrawide), Features LED flash, panorama, HDR, Video 1080p@30fps, SELFIE CAMERA: Single 8 MP, f/2.0 Video.

Make positive this matches by coming into your mannequin quantity.
DISPLAY Type: IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen, 16M colours, Size 5.8 inches, 82.6 cm2 (80.7% display-to-physique ratio), Resolution 720 x 1560 pixels, 19.5: 9 ratio (296 ppi density)
OS Android 9.0 (Pie); One UI, Chipset Exynos 7884, CPU Octa-core (2×1.6 GHz & 6×1.35 GHz)
Card slot microSD, as much as 512 GB (devoted slot), Internal Storage: 32 GB, 3 GB RAM
Sensors: Fingerprint (rear-mounted), accelerometer, proximity, compass
Active noise cancellation with devoted mic
